page.description: Get the value of a control in the UX Component.

argument.name: name
argument.description: The control to get the value from.

section.description: If you are reading the value in a control that is in a Repeating Section, use 'name:rownumber' for the field name. If you are reading the value from a List control and you want the value of a particular column in the list, use this syntax: {dialog.Object).getValue('list::listName::columnName). To get the logical row number of the current row in the list use for the columnName.
